briefdescription.para: Static constant for determining if the material has vanishing stress components (is reduced).

Tolerance for stress reduction.

briefdescription.para: Computes the stored energy for the VanishingStress material.

The Green-Lagrangian strain.

briefdescription.para: Get the name of the implemented material.
Return the stored potential energy of the material.

detaileddescription.para: This function return the free Helmholtz energy of the material

parameterdescription.para: Strain tag indicating which strain tensor components are passed.
The underlying Eigen type.
The strain tensor components passed in Voigt notation or matrix notation.

briefdescription.para: Get the stresses of the material.

parameterdescription.para: Strain tag indicating which strain tensor components are passed.
Boolean indicating whether to return Voigt-shaped result.
The underlying Eigen type.
The strain tensor components passed in Voigt notation or matrix notation.

briefdescription.para: Get the tangentModuli of the material.

parameterdescription.para: Strain tag indicating which strain tensor components are passed.
Boolean indicating whether to return Voigt-shaped result.
The underlying Eigen type.
The strain tensor components passed in Voigt notation or matrix notation.

simplesect.para: Tangent moduli in Voigt notation or as fourth-order tensor.

briefdescription.para: Initializes unknown strains based on fixed indices.

The input strain matrix.
